name: Terence Eden (@Edent@mastodon.social)
summary:
Urgh! Yet another thing that #MacOS can't do which is standard on #Linux.

I have my monitor connected to my MacBook using HDMI. Sound comes out of my monitor.

It is *impossible* to control the volume of the Mac once it is connected. Laptop volume buttons just show the ðŸš« symbol when pressed.

It's a work Mac, so I can't install any software on it to change this behaviour. But, frankly, why should I have to? Every other laptop works fine with an external speaker. 

Why are Macs so crap?
